distributed_by: The Cannon Group Norstar Releasing Golan-Globus Productions
Plot: A naïve, good-hearted Los Angeles waitress does not think twice about helping her troubled roommate. Her help lands her in Central America fleeing for her life with a grungy mercenary.
starring: Carey Lowell Charles Rocket Trudy Dotchterman Norbert Weisser Linda Kerridge Nicholas Guest Thom Mathews Courteney Cox Galyn Görg
Release: The film was given a limited theatrical release in March 1987. The home video release was in the United States in 1990 by Media Home Entertainment.
written_by: Gene O'Neill Albert Pyun Noreen Tobin
